comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Wednesday, 28 February 1900. Looking east across Woolloomooloo Bay towards Cowper Wharf Potts Point from the Botanical Gardens. Read all about it - SMH 1/3/1900 p.8 - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14297130 (click on 'view entire page' for the whole story - it is quite a good read). I was puzzled over the "eve" in the title. The newspaper makes it all clear - the ships sailed off and moored down the harbour overnight before leaving the next day. Bread and circuses!
